details:
adjective
- belonging to the past
= synonyms: historic
- having once lived or existed or taken place in the real world as distinct from being legendary
= example: having once lived or existed or taken place in the real world as distinct from being legendary
- used of the study of a phenomenon (especially language) as it changes through time
= synonyms: diachronic
- of or relating to the study of history
= example: of or relating to the study of history
